txt_en: More dreams are lost to self-doubt than to failure.
txt_cn: 因自我怀疑而失去的梦想比因失败而失去的更多。

txt_en: Life is short; Live it!
txt_cn: 人生苦短，活出精彩。

txt_en: Happiness depends on your mindset.
txt_cn: 幸福取决于你的心态。

txt_en: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
txt_cn: 每一项成就都始于尝试的决定。

txt_en: Take in courage and let fear fade away.
txt_cn: 吸入勇气，呼出恐惧。

txt_en: The future depends on what you do today.
txt_cn: 未来取决于你今天的所作所为。

txt_en: Winter is not a season, but a celebration.
txt_cn: 冬天不是一个季节，而是一个庆典。

txt_en: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
txt_cn: 你必须做你认为自己做不到的事情。

txt_en: The greatest risk is not taking one.
txt_cn: 最大的风险是不冒风险。

txt_en: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
txt_cn: 幸福不是偶然，而是选择。

txt_en: Your life is your message.
txt_cn: 你的生活就是你的信息。

txt_en: Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind.
txt_cn: 时间飞逝，但它的影子留下了。

txt_en: Keep going. Be all in.
txt_cn: 继续前行，全力以赴。

txt_en: Silence is an answer too.
txt_cn: 沉默也是一种回答。

txt_en: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
txt_cn: 时间是一个人最宝贵的财富。

txt_en: Dreams are the touchstones of our character.
txt_cn: 梦想是我们性格的基石。

txt_en: Courage is grace under pressure.
txt_cn: 勇气是在压力下保持优雅。

txt_en: Everything you can imagine is real.
txt_cn: 你能想象的一切都是真实的。

txt_en: Be the hero of your own story.
txt_cn: 做你自己故事里的英雄。

txt_en: Be yourself, but always your better self.
txt_cn: 做你自己，但永远要成为更好的自己。

txt_en: A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.
txt_cn: 一帆风顺的大海造就不了熟练的水手。

txt_en: No snowflake ever falls in the wrong place.
txt_cn: 没有一片雪花会落在错误的地方。

txt_en: Don't dream your life, but live your dream.
txt_cn: 不要梦想你的生活，而要实现你的梦想。

txt_en: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
txt_cn: 你不需要伟大才能开始，但你必须开始才能伟大。
